data.title: Fixed sprite offset for light vehicle factory roofs

data.title: Fixes incorrect package name in INSTALL.md
data.body: No package `libmono-winforms4.0-cil` exists in Debian or Ubuntu. The correct package name is `libmono-system-windows-forms4.0-cil`.

data.title: Add support for C&C Generals .big archive files
data.body: Useful/needed for my Generals demake. Complements #6173.

data.title: Diplomacy change does not change teamtalk
data.body: We teamed up in the game, but could not communicate. He got my beacons, but did the others also get them?? Chat could not be turned into team-chat mode..

data.title: Cursor scales with pixel doubling
data.body: The cursor now scales correctly when pixel doubling is enabled.

data.title: Added a LineImpactProjectile
data.body:
Requires #6162. (Currently based off it, can rebase if required).

New projectile can create multiple weapon impacts along its travel vector.
(i.e. apply all warheads effects at multiple positions as it travels).

You can currently tell it to:
- Create an impact every WRange.
- Only create an impact if at least WRange away from its source.
- Only create an impact if at least within WRange of its target.
- Keep traveling for up to WRange beyond its target.
- Have damage falloff (essentially passed as a firepowermodifier to the weapon during impact) that
  - Has a WRange before it starts
  - Has a WRange at which it reaches maximum falloff
  - Has a maximum falloff.

The projectile interpolates its impact positions, so its works for any projectile speed (i.e. the WRange between impacts you specify is always the WRange between impacts, regardless of the projectile speed).

Has the standard projectile fluff (contrail, trail, inaccuracy, angle, High, image, shadow). (Was based off bullet).

Does NOT support
- Falloff per actor hit. (Would require plumbing rework to weapon and warheads).
- Only a single impact per actor. (If you give the warheads a large spread, and you make the WRange between impacts small, you can hit a single actor multiple times. I suggest using AbsoluteSpreadDamage warheads for more accurate control. To do only single hits per actor would require plumbing rework to weapon and warheads.)

Possibly Closes  #4458.

I've attempted to apply it to the D2K sonic tank. But its balancing needs work.

data.title: Show : password protected games
data.body:
checkbox to make private (password protected)  games visible or unvisible ... default : on (this prevents new player being confused not finding their friends games) 
definitly needet !

same goes for "Full Games"

data.title: Fixes D2K AI constantly repairing weather damage.
data.body: Closes #6149.

data.title: Add WithSpriteBarrel
data.body:
Functionally an equivalent to WithVoxelBarrel for SHPs (and whatever other image formats might be supported in the future).

Must-have for a project I'm currently working on.

data.title: Fix D2k heavy factories roof ZOffset
data.body: Closes #6236.

data.title: Issue with order click area (diamond-shaped cells)
data.body:
I noticed this when I tested a larger cellsize of 110x64 (diamond shape), basically I have to click almost smack in the middle of a cell, otherwise the move/attack order will be issued to the nearest adjacent cell even if the mouse was within the targeted cell at the time of clicking.

Maybe the click area isn't scaled with cell size?

data.title: Different sounds for joining/leaving/messages ?
data.body:
Most of the time i just listen to the game to know if people join my game room. But the problem is that i cant tell difference from those players that leave my room. Same happens when someone sends a message.

So could we have it customizable to put your own wav files for:
- Player has joined the room.
- Player has left the room.
- A message has been received.

data.title: RA music download crashing because scores.mix is in use
data.body:
Crashes with Exception of type `System.IO.IOException`: The process cannot access the file 'Documents\OpenRA\Content\ra\scores.mix' because it is being used by another process.
Seems to happen only when HM is playing

data.title: Lag causes replays to stop
data.body:
ive noticed this in several replays , if the (real) game got slowed down because of lags (but the whole game went fine) it can cause replays to stop the playback after a certain amount of minutes (being watched) and remain that way ...

so basicly , you can loose (good?) replays if there was connection problems involved during the real game

data.title: Tanya Auto attack failing
data.body:
Tanya is auto attacking buildings with her pistols when you put her next to an enemy building.

Easily reproduced on bleed by going to the first mission and putting her in range og the topmost power plant.

I am pretty sure she doesnt do any damage to the buildings though.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3696546/3897603/10973dc8-2263-11e4-8368-87d6c270efe7.png)

data.title: Resume from replay
data.body:
This branch allows you to resume games from replays.

It currently only supports single player games or games that you were the host of (All other human players wont do anything and if you werent host then some derpyness happens).

TODO:
- ~~Add the "Battle Control Initiated" sound when it is done loading the replay.~~
- Support Multiplayer loading
- Support changing players before restart (for example change an AI to a human player)
- ~~Add a new Load UI instead of leeching off the replay browser~~
- ~~Add a save button to the game menu, partially, still some cosmetic stuff left~~ 

To test use the branch, make a replay and build some structures, go to the replay browser, select the replay and hit resume.

data.title: Beacon cannot be cancelled by right click
data.body: It just adds the beacon whether i left or right click. Really annoying if you press it in accident; no way to cancel it.

data.title: Produced units are drawn on top of the D2K heavy factory roof.
data.body: It looks like the z-offset is wrong.

data.title: New cheat command: give all cheats
data.body:
This would be very useful since i always check all cheats anyway when i test maps.

This button should only give the cheats that are important for game-wise, so it would not give these cheats:
- Show Unit Paths
- Grow Resources
- Give Exploration (if you want to test how far building can see, you should never press this)
- Show A\* Cost
- Show Combat Geometry
- Show Render Geometry

Also it should give you at least 9 000 000 money since its really annoying to click "give 20000 cash" many times when you want to test something.

data.title: New cheat command: capture all buildings
data.body:
This would be very useful in testing: often i want to check if the ranges of the buildings in the map are correct.

Could call it "take all map buildings" and when you untick it, it would give them back to the map AI.
